original_text: To whom also he shewed himself alive after his passion by many infallible proofs, being seen of them forty days, and speaking of the things pertaining to the kingdom of God:
korean_text: 그가 고난 받으신 후에 또한 그들에게 확실한 많은 증거로 친히 살아 계심을 나타내사 사십 일 동안 그들에게 보이시며 하나님 나라의 일을 말씀하시니라

sentences.original_text: To whom also he shewed himself alive
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 또한 그는 살아 계신 자기 자신을 보여주셨고

sentences.original_text: being seen of them forty days
and speaking of things pertaining to kingdom of God
